abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column reviews shopping apps that help consumers time their purchases with best possible deals; notes such apps can often find deals better than those offered on Black Friday.
lead_paragraph: Shopping apps that help buyers build wish lists, track prices and find the best deals.

headline.main: Video Feature: Replacing the Black Friday Rush With a Few Leisurely Taps
headline.print_headline: Replacing the Black Friday Rush With a Few Leisurely Taps

snippet: Shopping apps that help buyers build wish lists, track prices and find the best deals.
